title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Semiconductor materials, their properties, crystal growth and wafer preparation, defects. Epitaxy vapor phase and molecular beam expitaxy, silicon on insulator. Oxidation processes â growth kinetics. Lithography âoptical, e-beam, X-ray, ion beam micro and nano lithography. Plasma processing-fundamental aspects, plasma etching and deposition. Diffusion processes. Ion implantation. Metallization and packaging. Yield and Reliability. VLSI and ULSI process integration.
